Starting vfmsub213pd tests
Testing vfmsub213pd (128-bit)
Test 1: a*b - c
a: 1.000000 2.000000 
b: 3.000000 4.000000 
c: 5.000000 6.000000 
result: -2.000000 2.000000 
result (hex): 0xc000000000000000 0x4000000000000000 

Test 2: Special values
a: inf nan 
b: 2.000000 3.000000 
c: 1.000000 1.000000 
result: inf nan 
result (hex): 0x7ff0000000000000 0x7ff8000000000000 

Testing vfmsub213pd (256-bit)
Test 1: a*b - c
a: 1.000000 2.000000 3.000000 4.000000 
b: 5.000000 6.000000 7.000000 8.000000 
c: 9.000000 10.000000 11.000000 12.000000 
result: -4.000000 2.000000 10.000000 20.000000 
result (hex): 0xc010000000000000 0x4000000000000000 0x4024000000000000 0x4034000000000000 

Test 2: Memory operand
a: 0.100000 0.200000 0.300000 0.400000 
b: 0.500000 0.600000 0.700000 0.800000 
c: 0.900000 1.000000 1.100000 1.200000 
result: -0.850000 -0.880000 -0.890000 -0.880000 
result (hex): 0xbfeb333333333333 0xbfec28f5c28f5c29 0xbfec7ae147ae147c 0xbfec28f5c28f5c28
